hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## Utility: run only once a year ## Run this if u want to delete all DwCAs (zip files) collected from Step 1 (range_1 - range_8). ## Be careful with this one, since downloading the zip files took a long time. ## We only run this once a year, I suppose.
## For eol-archive: production #cd /extra/dumps/TreatmentBank/
## For Mac Studio: development #cd /Volumes/Crucial_2TB/other_files2/dumps/TreatmentBank/
#ls -lt #rm -rf DwCA #ls -lt
